EmailTemplate.subject: Make the most of your trial
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You have 11 days remaining on your free trial. Design your store by following these easy steps! Resources <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/University/Welcome-to-Bigcommerce-University-Video/]]>| Log in <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login]]>
Make your store stand out with a beautiful theme Start now <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login]]> We’ve already picked a theme to get you started, but there are dozens of Bigcommerce templates to choose from that will give you a gorgeous, mobile-friendly store that sells.
Start Now » <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login]]>
